Package src.ticket

Class PriceTable

Object
PriceTable
public class PriceTable extends Object
Represents the price table for different days of the week, classes of cinema, type of movies etc Regular, Platinum and Atmos all have nested hashtables a bigger hashtable to contain them was avoided for slight improvement in readibility
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.3
Author:
Pock Xuan

    • setPrice

      public static boolean setPrice(ClassOfCinema classOfCinema, Date date, AgeGroup ageGroup, SeatType seatType, TypeOfMovie typeOfMovie, double price)
      Change price of a ticket given date object
      Parameters:
      classOfCinema - Regular/ Atmos/ Platinum
      date - a Date object containing time
      ageGroup - Student/ Adult/ Senior
      seatType - Normal/ Couple/ Elite/ Ultima
      typeOfMovie - 3D and Digital
      price - Price to be updated to
      Returns:
      if the update was successful or not

    • setPrice

      Parameters:
      classOfCinema - Regular/ Atmos/ Platinum
      day - Day of the screening
      ageGroup - Student/ Adult/ Senior
      seatType - Normal/ Couple/ Elite/ Ultima
      typeOfMovie - 3D and Digital

      if the update was successful or not
